content.question: Which of the following are steps to calm an adult in distress? (Select all that apply)

answers.option: Guide them to take slow, deep breaths.
Speak calmly and reassure without forcing responses.
Force them to sit or stop shaking immediately.
Ignore their emotional state and focus only on tasks.

content.correct: Correct! Breathing guidance and calm reassurance help manage distress safely.
content.incorrect: Incorrect. The correct answers are: Slow deep breaths and calm reassurance without forcing.
